Guardrail: Check that the management of IAM Roles and Policies for authorized principals only, ideally build automation roles only.
Rationale: The creation, update, and deletion of roles and policies and SAML provides needs to occur on approved changes to the IAM environment. However, these changes should be gated and restricted to authorized roles only, such as build automation, to prevent against any unintended principal granting themselves unauthorized permissions. The following permissions should be scoped appropriately.
Remediation: Secure to only allow build automation.
